Summary: While shooting pics of a lake, a local saw an object crossing the sky
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bagnoli Irpino
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi'm not the eyewitness, i'm just reporting a story read in the local news and lately validated by the local carabinieri (military police). that's the story: a 30year old man on 27th july shoot some 10 pics portraiting a mountain lake, laceno (approx. 40���48'n - 15���05'e). once he got home, and dowloaded the pics into his own pc, he was amazed when he saw a disc apparently quickly crossing the sky above the lake. then he brought the pics to the local carabinieri's, and they passed them to the r.i.s. (special investigation squad) which validated the pics as "unmanipulated" and "original". you can read about the story here (only in italian, sorry): http:\\www.ilmattino.it\articolo.php?id=67466&sez=napoli http:\\www.ufosullarete.it\articoli-ufo\ufo-laceno-avellino.html
